tasks.description: Set up the basic project structure with Vite, React, and Tailwind CSS.
Create the basic HTML structure for the landing page, including the header, main content area, and footer.
Configure Tailwind CSS with the color palette and fonts from the style_guide.md.
Create a React component for the agent table and fetch the data from agents.json to display it.
Style the agent table according to the style_guide.md.
Create a React component for the agent detail modal.
Implement the functionality to open the agent detail modal when an agent's name is clicked in the table.
Populate the agent detail modal with the data from the selected agent.
Style the agent detail modal according to the style_guide.md.
Create the 'Can you recommend something?' button on the landing page.
Create a React component for the personas overlay.
Implement the functionality to open the personas overlay when the 'Can you recommend something?' button is clicked.
Fetch the data from personas.json and display the personas as cards in the overlay.
Style the personas overlay and cards according to the style_guide.md.
Create the persona detail page.
Implement the navigation from a persona card to the corresponding persona detail page.
Display the detailed information for the selected persona on the page.
Display the recommended agents for the selected persona on the page.
Style the persona detail page according to the style_guide.md.
Implement interactive filtering and sorting for the agent table.
Add a search bar to filter agents by name.
